title: B.S. Report - The Grantland Basketball Hour (Ep. 8)
description: Jalen Rose, Zach Lowe, and Bill Simmons ask which teams have a sense of urgency and whether there's a solution to the Hack-a-Shaq problem. Then: playoff predictions.
